itemDescription: Congregationalist minister at Whitefield's Tabernacle in London

wikipedia_page.main: John Campbell (1795–1867) was a Congregationalist minister at Whitefield's Tabernacle in London. He was only the second successor of its founder, the Methodist George Whitefield. In the literary field, he was the founder of a number of religious magazines and journals, including the Christian Witness and the British Banner.
